extension.configuration: {"id":"com.smartq.calendarViz.visualizationDatamodelHandler","version":"1.0.0","module":"com-smartq-calendarviz/calendarVizdatamodelhandler","method":"getHandler","config":{"vizPreference":50,"measureLabelConfig":{"supportedEdges":["color","size","tooltip"],"defaultEdge":"row","visibility":"hidden"},"edgeConfig":{"row":{"contentType":"categorical","global":{"priority":1,"minCount":3,"maxCount":3,"preferredMax":3},"ui":{"customName":{"key":"CALENDARVIZ_ROW","default":"Rows"},"description":"1st: ID, 2nd: Task name, 3rd: Date (Rok izvedbe)"},"categorical":{"functionalInfo":["categoricalType"]}},"color":{"contentType":"categorical","global":{"priority":3,"minCount":0,"maxCount":1},"ui":{"customName":{"key":"CALENDARVIZ_COLOR","default":"Color Category"},"description":"Category for color-coding tasks"},"categorical":{"functionalInfo":["inner","row","categoricalType"]}},"tooltip":{"contentType":"categorical","global":{"priority":5,"minCount":0,"maxCount":5},"ui":{"customName":{"key":"CALENDARVIZ_TOOLTIP","default":"Additional Info"},"description":"Additional information to show in task tooltips"},"categorical":{"functionalInfo":["categoricalType"]}},"measures":{"contentType":"measures","global":{"minCount":0,"maxCount":1,"priority":10},"ui":{"customName":{"key":"CALENDARVIZ_MEASURES","default":"Measures"},"description":"Optional numeric values"}},"size":"none","glyph":"none"}}}
